DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Information health screening : Interested person screen eligibility undergo direct medical history examination , echocardiogram ( do within one year ) , limited ABI test , maximal treadmill test oxygen kinetics . 2 . Measure fitness level begin exercise training , 10 20 week : DEXA scan , body fat analysis , strength balance measurement , blood test . 3 . Train 10 week supervise small group format . Classes meet three time week hour . Participants randomly assign : 1 ) Flexibility tone exercise + health education , 2 ) Functional circuit training + home activity + tailored physical activity guidance . 4 . Follow-up phone call additional 10 week .
